data.lyric:
[ti:Don't Break My Heart]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Don't Break My Heart - The Weeknd
[00:01.90]Lyrics by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Matt Cohn/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:03.81]Composed by：Max Martin/Oscar Holter/Matt Cohn/Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin
[00:05.72]I'm paralyzed
[00:06.46]
[00:13.23]Let's go
[00:13.58]
[00:14.23]I see you drowning in the purple lights
[00:16.70]
[00:17.27]Diamonds shining bright
[00:19.10]I see every ice on you
[00:22.52]You snatch my soul I'm crucified
[00:24.33]
[00:25.02]I feel paralyzed
[00:26.91]I'm so mesmerized by you
[00:29.74]By you
[00:30.32]But now I know you're right for me
[00:32.46]
[00:33.33]Ecstasy
[00:34.97]I keep coming back for more
[00:38.17]I think that you would die for me
[00:41.24]Destiny
[00:43.01]And this time I know for sure
[00:45.96]Just don't break my heart
[00:48.00]Don't break my heart
[00:49.52]Don't let me down please
[00:53.63]Don't you break my heart
[00:55.58]Don't break my heart
[00:57.42]I don't know if I can take it anymore
[01:01.65]Take it anymore take it anymore
[01:05.84]I can't take another heartbreak or I'll end it all
[01:09.54]And the girl I used to love
[01:11.58]We broke up in the club
[01:13.27]
[01:13.96]And I almost died in the discotheque
[01:17.30]And now I know she wasn't right for me
[01:19.57]
[01:20.54]Enemy
[01:21.60]
[01:22.24]I kept coming back for more
[01:25.33]I'd rather you would die for me
[01:28.45]Destiny
[01:30.21]And this time I know for sure
[01:33.05]Just don't break my heart
[01:35.01]Don't break my heart
[01:36.62]Don't let me down please
[01:40.18]
[01:40.73]Don't you break my heart
[01:42.83]Don't break my heart
[01:44.69]I don't know if I can take it anymore
[01:48.36]
[01:48.92]Don't break my heart
[01:50.96]Don't you don't you
[01:52.85]I'm falling apart already
[01:56.06]
[01:56.69]Don't you break my heart
[01:58.08]
[01:58.59]Don't you don't you
[02:00.46]I don't know if I can take it anymore
[02:04.44]
[02:05.66]I believe the liquor's talking
[02:09.57]I just need the room to stop
[02:12.93]And I could be the one you want
[02:17.15]Just as long as you don't break my heart
[02:21.34]And I realize
[02:22.52]
[02:23.26]When I kissed your neck
[02:24.45]
[02:25.17]That the room is hot
[02:26.94]I can taste your sweat
[02:28.29]
[02:28.91]It's just you and I
[02:30.07]
[02:30.78]In the discotheque
[02:31.95]
[02:32.80]But don't you worry
[02:35.34]

[02:37.85]Don't break my heart
[02:39.25]

[02:43.79]Don't you break my heart
[02:45.75]Don't break my heart
